content.body: Is BasicFormatMatcher descriptive of ICU4C internals. That is, does "do whatever ICU4C does for datetime format matching" mean BasicFormatMatcher or something different?
* Is BasicFormatMatcher descriptive of ICU4C internals? That is, does "do whatever ICU4C does for datetime format matching" mean BasicFormatMatcher or something different?

m.new_content.body: Is BasicFormatMatcher descriptive of ICU4C internals? That is, does "do whatever ICU4C does for datetime format matching" mean BasicFormatMatcher or something different?

content.body:
So I wrote up a new ECMA-402 proposal: https://github.com/eemeli/proposal-intl-root-locale

I added that to next week's agenda, and hope to also present it to TG1 in Tokyo.
